title: Citibank and Grupo Monge Sign Agreement to Benefit Customers
summary: San Jose, Costa Rica - Citibank Costa Rica has signed an agreement with Importadora Monge, El Verdugo, El Gallo más Gallo and Play stores so that the stores can collect credit cards payments from Citibank customers.
tag-1: Citibank and Grupo Monge Sign Agreement to Benefit Customers
tag-3: San Jose, Costa Rica – Citibank Costa Rica has signed an agreement with Importadora Monge, El Verdugo, El Gallo más Gallo and Play stores so that the stores can collect credit cards payments from Citibank customers.
tag-4: "This new alliance expands the service we provide to customers in our stores across the country. We worked jointly with Citibank to technologically enable our stores to receive card payments from more than 250,000 customers. For us, this agreement is part of a benefit we are offering to Costa Ricans so they will have the ability to make their card payments easily and securely," said Hugo Pereira, Managing Director, Grupo Monge, Costa Rica.
tag-5: "For Citibank, the Importadora Monge, El Verdugo, El Gallo más Gallo and Play retail chains are strategic partners and, now with this alliance, we are deepening our business partnership for the benefit of our customers. At Citi, we constantly enhance our product and service channels to better serve our customers and that is why, with the addition of these 4 appliance retail chains, we are increasing our credit card's points of payment to over 300," said Gijs Veltman, CCO, Citibank Costa Rica.
tag-6: "Grupo Monge constantly works on providing its customers access to new services that improve their standard of living, such as the ability to pay their credit cards in our stores across the country," said Pereira.
tag-7: Citibank Costa Rica is one of the leading credit card issuers in the country with more than 250,000 customers and a presence of more than 40 years in the local market. In 2012, Citi will reach its 200th anniversary.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-9: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://new.citi.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-10: Grupo Monge Grupo Monge was founded more than 38 years ago in the province of Alajuela. It currently has Importadora Monge, El Verdugo, Play, and El Gallo más Gallo strores across the country. It also has a presence in Nicaragua, El Salvador, Guatemala and Honduras.
tag-11: For additional information, please visit www.grupom.net.
